Retention adjustment

The retention factor is always 1 because it is not applicable to pre-16 students. The adjustment is always £0.

Where programme cost weighting comes from

For directly funded 14 to 16 year old students, we apply a weighting of 1.04 to the student funding rate.

More about Funding rates and formula.

Where proportion of students comes from

Proportion of students is calculated using 2019 to 2020 student home postcodes and the index of multiple deprivation 2019.

Where proportion of students comes from

Most 14 and 15 year olds will not have completed maths or English GCSE. Proportion of students for low prior attainment is generated from the proportion of students for deprivation funding.
